snippet: Germany’s Central Office for the Investigation of Nazi Crimes compiled a list of 50 former guards who worked at the concentration camp in Poland and might be brought to court.
abstract: Germany’s Central Office for Investigation of Nazi Crimes has prepared list of 50 former guards who worked at Auschwitz concentration camp in Nazi-occupied Poland and are still alive, and may finally be brought to account before court of law.
lead_paragraph: Germany’s Central Office for the Investigation of Nazi Crimes compiled a list of 50 former guards who worked at the concentration camp in Poland and might be brought to court.

headline.seo: Nearly 70 Years Later, a New Round of Auschwitz Prosecutions
headline.main: Nearly 70 Years Later, a New Round of Auschwitz Prosecutions
headline.print_headline: Nearly 70 Years Later, a New Round of Auschwitz Prosecutions
